intro: Maughania stricta, commonly known as the rigid maughania, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its upright growth habit and showy, tubular flowers. Due to its ornamental value, it is sometimes cultivated for its aesthetic appeal in horticultural settings.
